name: Jet Wars
description:
In this game , you play as a space cat that decided to jump down with a jetpack to the earth and destroy it , However , the cat must get through the earth's mightiest defenders ( the Jetpack dogs ) .

Controls :

A and D to move Left and Right

Left mouse button to shoot downwards

ESC to pause

Goal :

try to dodge as many bullets as possible while killing as many dogs as possible
